attributes.action: Protect the profession of the Mental health Nurse
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Mental Health Nurses are a valued and essential member of the mental health team and service. They are skilled and knowledgable in metal health due to their specialist training. We are in opposition to the move towards a "generic nurse". Specialist mental health nursing must remain, to ensure and maintain standards of excellence. In line with new legislation and mental health nurses extended role it is essential that we remain specialists to fulfil these tasks competently and expertly.
